    2: namespace Symbiotatk\Symbtk\Data\Sqlite;
    3:
    4: const IS_INT = 1;
    5: const IS_STR = 2;
    6: const ASSOC = 1;
    7: const NUM = 2;
    8: const BOTH = 3;
    9:
    10:
    11: /** Close connection.
    12: * @param \PDO $conn
    13: * @return Bool false
    14: */
    15: function close (\PDO $conn) {
    16: return false;
    17: }
    18:
    19: /** Create tables
    20: * @param String $path Path to sqlite file
    21: * @param Array $commands
    22: * @return Bool false
    23: */
    24: function createTables(String $path, Array $commands = null) {
    25: $tables = ($commands) ? $commands : getDefaultSchema();
    26: $conn = open($path);
    27: foreach ($tables as $command) {
    28: $conn->exec($command);
    29: }
    30: close($conn);
    31: }
    32:
    33: /** Default PDO options
    34: * @return Array $options
    35: */
    36: function default_options () {
    37: return array(
    38: \PDO::ATTR_EMULATE_PREPARES => false,
    39: \PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE => \PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION,
    40: \PDO::ATTR_DEFAULT_FETCH_MODE => \PDO::FETCH_ASSOC
    41: );
    42: }
    43:
    44: /** Format DSN connection string
    45: * @param String $dsn
    46: * @return String $dsn
    47: */
    48: function dsn(String $str) {
    49: return "sqlite:" . $str;
    50: }
    51:
    52: /** Execute SQL
    53: * @param \PDO $conn
    54: * @param String $stmt
    55: * @return Bool false;
    56: */
    57: function exec(\PDO $conn, String $stmt) {
    58: $conn->exec($stmt);
    59: return false;
    60: }
    61:
    62: /** Return default schema
    63: * @return Array $array Empty
    64: */
    65: function getDefaultSchema () {
    66: return array();
    67: }
    68:
    69: /** Return last inserted id
    70: * @param \PDO $conn
    71: * @return Int $id
    72: */
    73: function getLastInsertId(\PDO $conn) {
    74: return $conn->lastInsertId();
    75: }
    76:
    77: /** Return list of tables
    78: * @param \PDO $conn
    79: * @return Array $table_list
    80: */
    81: function getTableList(\PDO $conn) {
    82: $stmt = $conn->query("SELECT name
    83: FROM sqlite_master
    84: WHERE type = 'table'
    85: ORDER BY name");
    86: $tables = [];
    87: while ($row = $stmt->fetch(\PDO::FETCH_ASSOC)) {
    88: $tables[] = $row['name'];
    89: }
    90:
    91: return $tables;
    92: }
    93:
    94: /** Verify existing table
    95: * @param \PDO $conn
    96: * @param String $table_name
    97: * @return Bool true||false
    98: */
    99: function hasTable(\PDO $conn, String $name) {
    100: return in_array($name, getTableList($conn));
    101: }
    102:
    103: /** Verify DSN as in memory db
    104: * @param String $dsn
    105: * @return Bool false || true
    106: */
    107: function in_memory_db (String $str) {
    108: if ($str == ":memory:") {
    109: return true;
    110: }
    111: return false;
    112: }
    113:
    114: /** Verify DSN as in memory db or file
    115: * @param String $dsn
    116: * @return Mixed $dsn_or_error_message
    117: */
    118: function is_path_or_memory (String $str) {
    119: if (in_memory_db($str)) {
    120: return $str;
    121: }
    122: if (! is_file($str)) {
    123: die ("DB error: File does not exist. [$str].");
    124: }
    125: return $str;
    126: }
    127:
    128: /** Open connection to database
    129: * @param String $dsn
    130: * @param Array $options
    131: * @return Mixed $errorMessage || \PDO $object
    132: */
    133: function open (String $path_or_memory, Array $options = null) {
    134: $options = ($options) ? $options : default_options();
    135: $dsn = dsn(is_path_or_memory($path_or_memory));
    136: try {
    137: $pdo = new \PDO($dsn, '', '', $options);
    138: } catch (\PDOException $e) {
    139: die ('DB error');
    140: }
    141: return $pdo;
    142: }
    143:
    144: /** Verify PDO connection
    145: * @param \PDO $conn
    146: * @return Bool true || false
    147: */
    148: function ping ($conn) {
    149: return (!$conn) ? false : true;
    150: }
    151:
    152: /** Execute query and return result
    153: * @param \PDO $conn
    154: * @param String $statement
    155: * @return Array $rows
    156: */
    157: function query(\PDO $conn, String $stmt) {
    158: $query = $conn->query($stmt);
    159: $res = [];
    160: while ($row = $query->fetch(\PDO::FETCH_ASSOC)) {
    161: array_push($res, $row);
    162: }
    163:
    164: return $res;
    165: }
